ClimateAI is a mission-driven for-profit venture, currently in stealth mode aiming to create resilience products at the intersection of food, water, and energy. We use AI to predict the risk of climate change on specific assets and use this info to help design climate adaptation strategies for stakeholders ranging from growers in agriculture to investors in developing economies. We are challenging conventional wisdom by attacking problems in climate science that were previously thought to be insurmountable. These technological breakthroughs are unlocking new business model innovations for accelerating climate resilience.
We just raised our pre-series-A financing round backed by some of the most prominent names in the venture capital industry. ClimateAI was founded at Stanford University and the CEO has worked with Vice President Al Gore. We’re looking for a smart, passionate, team-oriented Software Engineer to join our growing team.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

SUMMARY
We are seeking a talented and motivated Software Engineer I to join our development team. As a Software Engineer I, you will work under the guidance of senior engineers and contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of software applications. This is an entry-level position that offers an opportunity to gain hands-on experience and grow your technical skills in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.

· Collaborate with senior engineers to understand project requirements and contribute to the design and architecture of software applications.
· Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using established coding standards and best practices.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

Job Summary:

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

Airy is an open-source stream processing platform for conversational data based on Apache Kafka to process and react to millions of messages in realtime. We power the future of Conversational AI by providing clean contextual information and bringing in humans whenever it's necessary to deliver great customer experiences.
At Airy, we're dedicated to powering a world of seamless, personal, and trusted interactions between customers and businesses. We focus on emerging consumer technologies such as messaging and voice and are working with some of the world's leading brands across a wide spectrum of industries and business sizes.
What you will do:
As a Backend Software Engineer at Airy, you will be responsible for helping develop and maintain our scalable open-source conversational platform (https://docs.airy.co) as well as our cloud offering. This means creativity and collaboration as part of a cross-functional team, crafting high-quality and reusable solutions while writing documentation in the open.

Who We Are
Hungryroot is the all-in-one recipe and grocery service. We're here to help people feel their best and make grocery shopping, cooking, and enjoying healthy food easier than ever. So, we're creating the first-of-its-kind food experience that puts people (and the planet) first, built for busy lives and individual needs.
We are a distributed team built on top talent from across the U.S. While we have an office in NYC, we support employees creating "offices" wherever they are. We believe in fostering team connection and collaboration across all of our "offices" - so don't expect to be online at 6 am to make a meeting if you're on the West coast. Expect to attend regular team building events, and to be able to work from the beach every once in a while. Expect to be treated like an owner who cares about our common goal, not someone who has to clock in and out of work.

Company Overview

DocuSign helps organizations connect and automate how they agree. Our flagship product, eSignature, is the world’s #1 way to sign electronically on practically any device, from virtually anywhere, at any time. Today, more than a million customers and a billion users in over 180 countries use DocuSign to accelerate the process of doing business and simplify people’s lives.

Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day.

About Us:
We're on a mission to make it possible for every person, team, and company to be able to tailor their software to solve any problem and take on any challenge. Computers may be our most powerful tools, but most of us can't build or modify the software we use on them every day. At Notion, we want to change this with focus, design, and craft.
We've been working on this together since 2016, and have customers like Pixar, Mitsubishi, Figma, Plaid, Match Group, and thousands more on this journey with us. Today, we're growing fast and excited for new teammates to join us who are the best at what they do. Also, experience and familiarity with agile development and test processes is a plus.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We use AI to predict the risk of climate change on specific assets and use this info to help design climate adaptation strategies for stakeholders ranging from growers in agriculture to investors in developing economies. We are challenging conventional wisdom by attacking problems in climate science that were previously thought to be insurmountable. These technological breakthroughs are unlocking new business model innovations for accelerating climate resilience.
We just raised our pre-series-A financing round backed by some of the most prominent names in the venture capital industry. ClimateAI was founded at Stanford University and the CEO has worked with Vice President Al Gore. We’re looking for a smart, passionate, team-oriented Software Engineer to join our growing team.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We focus on innovative technologies that can improve the way doctors treat people with heart arrhythmias, or irregular heartbeats.

Responsibilities
Qualifications

In addition to Flexible Spending Account(FSA) Options like Health Care, Limited Purpose and Dependent Care.



10 paid holidays per year plus 17 days of Paid Personal Time Off(PPTO) (prorated upon hire and increased by tenure) and 10 paid sick days per year as well as 12 weeks of paid Parental leave and 8 weeks of paid Supplemental Disability.



We also provide generous benefits like mental and emotional health benefits through our EAP and Lyra. A 401K company match, gym and cellphone service reimbursements. The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

Our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare, with leading businesses and products in diagnostics, medical devices, nutritionals and branded generic medicines. Our 115,000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countries.
A healthy heart is essential to good health. That's why we're committed to advancing treatments for people with cardiovascular disease. As a global leader in Cardiac Rhythm Technologies, our breakthrough medical technologies help restore people's health so they can get back to living their best lives, faster. We focus on innovative technologies that can improve the way doctors treat people with heart arrhythmias, or irregular heartbeats.

Airy is an open-source stream processing platform for conversational data based on Apache Kafka to process and react to millions of messages in realtime. We power the future of Conversational AI by providing clean contextual information and bringing in humans whenever it's necessary to deliver great customer experiences.
At Airy, we're dedicated to powering a world of seamless, personal, and trusted interactions between customers and businesses. We focus on emerging consumer technologies such as messaging and voice and are working with some of the world's leading brands across a wide spectrum of industries and business sizes.
What you will do:
As a Backend Software Engineer at Airy, you will be responsible for helping develop and maintain our scalable open-source conversational platform (https://docs.airy.co) as well as our cloud offering. Who We Are
Hungryroot is the all-in-one recipe and grocery service. We're here to help people feel their best and make grocery shopping, cooking, and enjoying healthy food easier than ever. So, we're creating the first-of-its-kind food experience that puts people (and the planet) first, built for busy lives and individual needs.
We are a distributed team built on top talent from across the U.S. While we have an office in NYC, we support employees creating "offices" wherever they are. We believe in fostering team connection and collaboration across all of our "offices" - so don't expect to be online at 6 am to make a meeting if you're on the West coast. Expect to attend regular team building events, and to be able to work from the beach every once in a while. Expect to be treated like an owner who cares about our common goal, not someone who has to clock in and out of work.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We focus on innovative technologies that can improve the way doctors treat people with heart arrhythmias, or irregular heartbeats.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.

We are seeking a Junior Software Engineer to work on ACMO's flagship product - Fetchie.

About Fetchie

Fetchie is a price tracking app that helps online shoppers track price changes on their favourite products and never miss out on a deal. The app (available for iOS and Android) automatically gathers pricing information for the products you choose from any website, while also finding price from other stores for you to compare and sends instant notifications when there is a price drop. Users can use Fetchie while shopping in-store to scan the product barcode to find a wide range of alternatives nearby, ensuring users get the best value for their money. Fetchie taps into the insights of like-minded shoppers, helping users discover the latest finds and recommendations from their local area. Fetchie is committed to providing an ad-free space and refrains from user data collection, allowing everyone to enjoy their shopping experience.
